subject: Ref: admin/usgov/dept/2018/ a
body:
Ref: admin/usgov/dept/2018/ asiadevbank.cla.hors/xxcxv/docfile/004i
8th October, 2018
Attn:  
Address:  
Tel:  
Email:  
Your message received, we have confirmed that you are not serious about claiming your your approved part payment funds (US$5.5Million) because the earlier two bank account details giving to you were very okay.
You are just wasting our precious time, we might begin a process of cancelling your approved part payment funds (US$5.5Million) and recommending it for recall back to treasury as “UNCLAIMED” funds or “SUSPECTED” funds.
We have wasted more than enough time with you not knowing that we were just wasting our time which can be productively invested in other viable areas.
Thanks.
Signed : Ms. April Dawn Rippel
Senior Manager, Int'l Services
Global Offshore Financial Centre (GOFC)
Add: 6068 Business Park Dr., Columbus, GA 31909
Tel: +1 (706) 225-8644 (Call Direct)
Tel: +1 (940) 602 4848 (Extension)
Tel: +1 (940) 238 6318 (Extension)
E-mail: 
gofcColumbus@outlook.com
E-mail: 
adawnrippel@goff-c.org
Working Hours: 24/7
Cc: US Treasury department
Cc: Office of the Accountant General
Cc: Accounts Department
Cc : Records / File

subject: Re:  Ref: admin/usgov/dept/2018/ a
body:
Hello Senior Manager,

Thank you for your message. I apologize if I've given the impression that I'm not serious about claiming the approved part payment funds. It's just that, being a bit of a simpleton, I sometimes struggle to understand complex matters like these.

Could you please explain again why the two bank account details were okay?

Best wishes,
Patricia
